title: Diseases or conditions declared communicable or dangerous to public health
context: PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS §325-1 Diseases or conditions declared communicable or dangerous to public health. The director of health by rules adopted pursuant to chapter 91, may declare diseases or conditions to be communicable or dangerous to the public health. [L 1911, c 125, §3; RL 1925, §934; RL 1935, §1093; RL 1945, §2304; am L 1949, c 53, §29; RL 1955, §49-1; HRS §325-1; am L 1969, c 152, §1; am L 1981, c 185, §1; am L 1983, c 124, §16; am L 1987, c 265, §1]
